Package com.devwebsphere.wxsutils

This package contains the WXSUtils class which is used to implement high performance bulk and agent operations from a WebSphere eXtreme Scale client.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ContainsAllAgent<K> This is used to check if a set of keys within a given partition is present using a single hop.
GetAllAgent<K,V> This is used to fetch all the values for a set of keys within a given partition using a single hop.
InsertAgent<K,V> This is used to insert a chunk of records for a given partition using a single hop.
MapAgentExecutor<K,A extends MapGridAgent,X> This takes an list of Key/Agent pairs and then invokes the agent for each corresponding key and returns a Map with the agent result for each key if not null
ReduceAgentExecutor<K,A extends ReduceGridAgent> This agent is used to execute an Agent instance for each key using a single RPC call.
RemoveAgent<K> This is used to remove a set of records for a given partition using a single hop.
StartSingleCatalog  
StartSingleJVMGrid  
ThreadLocalSession Each WXSUtils instance uses a ThreadLocal to store a dedicated session for each thread.
ThreadStuff This is the state kept in the ThreadLocalSession for each thread.
WXSMap This is a simplified interface to a WXS Map.
WXSUtils This is a utility class.
 

Package com.devwebsphere.wxsutils Description

This package contains the WXSUtils class which is used to implement high performance bulk and agent operations from a WebSphere eXtreme Scale client. It also provides a simplified, non transactional, thread safe interface to the grid APIs using runtime exceptions. This is an easier interface than the normal transactional, session based interface to grid maps but you lose certain operations around locking and transactions.
